TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, that's the only thing you can do better know.

I wish the cake was not a lie

Granted, but it's poisoned.

I wish the next person to post will walk on thin ice.

Granted, the ice is on a sidewalk.

I wish for more potatoes.

granted,most are eaten by crows and the ones that are left become glados and start dispensing neurotoxin

i wish for being in possession of about 10 pounds of moon rocks contained within a clear jar

Granted, but apparently ground-up moon rocks are pure poison, and you are deathly ill.

I wish for a big fat dictionary.

Granted. But that's what she said, although you do still get a big fat "dictionary"

I wish I was better at KSP.

Granted, but you become unable to perform mundane tasks like eating and drinking, and eventually die.

I wish for a christmas present.

Granted, it's coal

I wish I could create plasma

Granted, it shocks you, then you die.

I wish for a twinkie.

Granted. It's so unhealthy you die shortly after eating it.

I wish for a slice of pristine chocolate cake. mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm...

Granted, but it comes with a 50% chance of being poisoned, and a 0% chance of being a lie (that's a lie)

I wish these posts counted towards my total post count.

Granted, the mods are probably hacking you.

I wish for the same thing as the above user.

Granted, you get a postcard entitled "same thing as the above user."

I wish for a bottle of rum.

Granted. The bottle's made of uranium, and you die of radiation poisoning.

I wish that Tekkit wasn't so addicting.

Granted, you are now bored.

I wish for the damn NSA to keep their noses out of my 1 acre micronation!

Granted, but it explodes. (I don't understand the question)

I wish for all Kerbals to be kittens.

Granted. They chew off all the wiring of your spacecraft, they shed everywhere, and they expect you to comfort them when all they give you back is scratches on your eyeball.

I wish santa was real

Granted, but his reindeers don't fly. (Only bats fly, right?)

I wish the above user's ASCII can be animated.

Granted. It is animated so bad, you die

I wish for potato

Granted, GLaDOS was a potato, so technically that counts?

I wish for the above user's signature to make sense

I wish for the above user's signature to make sense

Granted, you can make sense of it but, before long you are locked up as a lunatic

I wish for sleep

Granted, it's eternal.

I wish that school would close
Granted, but it doesn't for winter vacation and doesn't for weekends. It also doesn't let you out on regular days. You have to wait until summer to have it close for a week.

Grant-

[ERR] No wish was received. (Error code 24).

[LOG] Inputting random wish corruption factor.

[LOG] End result: noname117 is transported to the heart of a volcano.

[WRN] noname117 is being burned alive. Retrieve? (Y/N)

[iNP] "N"

[LOG] noname117 becomes part of the seething pool of magma and soon ceases to exist.

I wish people would utilise their memories better.

Granted. But they only rememeber being inside their mothers womb

I wish for 128 bit systems
